column5: Recently returned from Northern Ontario with a group of friends to the Attawapiskat River, Pym Island Camp in remote Northern Ontario. Was an exceptional week of river travel, nature and fishing.The report is huge and the 90 pictures won't fit here I don't think. So, if any are interested in our week, here's the link to take you along with us.http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/i...howtopic=55120Enjoy!
Hey Guys, this is a great read. Better than about any magazine article you'll ever see.
Moosebunk did it again.......great photos of a great trip. Thanks for sharing the link to that great write-up and photos of your trip (incl a side trip to the ER). Rich
About all I can say is "WOW".. Outstanding report and writing.
Moosebunk, how much do we owe you for taking us along... simply amazing
Another awesome report from moosebunk. You guys should check out ALL his reports on OFN. The great bear lake/tree river adventure is the finest fishing read/pic collection on the internet.
moosebunk - what an excellent report! i'm glad you had time to fish! i've decided to join the OFN group - you motivated me. thanks, phish
Wow, I just spent over an hour reading and enjoying the pics. Great job Moosebunk, I feel like I was on that trip with you guys. Outstanding!!!!!
Moosebunk, great report I hope to get up there someday, hard as a single as most of my friends would not spring for that much for a fishing trip. I would go in a heartbeat.
